languages.text: "Постигаю. Овладеваю тем, что... сделает меня ближе... к истокам". {n}Голос Ирлиэт дрожит от напряжения, клинок в руке трясется, а костяшки сжатого на рукояти кулака белеют словно кости.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Постигаю. Овладеваю тем, что... сделает меня ближе... к истокам". {n}Голос Ирлиэт дрожит от напряжения, клинок в руке трясется, а костяшки сжатого на рукояти кулака белеют словно кости.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Learning. Mastering that which will... bring me closer... to my roots..." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates with tension, the blade in her hand is shaking, and her knuckles are turning bone-white.{/n}

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Learning. Mastering that which will... bring me closer... to my roots..." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates with tension, the blade in her hand is shaking, and her knuckles are turning bone-white.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「学ぼう。自分のルーツに…近づくため…マスターする…」{n}ユリエットの声は緊張で震えている。手にした刃も震えており、指の関節は青白くなっていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Learning. Mastering that which will... bring me closer... to my roots..." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates with tension, the blade in her hand is shaking, and her knuckles are turning bone-white.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「学ぼう。自分のルーツに…近づくため…マスターする…」{n}ユリエットの声は緊張で震えている。手にした刃も震えており、指の関節は青白くなっていく。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我在学习。掌握那些让我……更加接近……祖先……的东西……”{n}伊莉耶特的声音紧张地颤抖着。她手中的刀不住地抖着，指关节也变得如骨头一样惨白。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Learning. Mastering that which will... bring me closer... to my roots..." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates with tension, the blade in her hand is shaking, and her knuckles are turning bone-white.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我在学习。掌握那些让我……更加接近……祖先……的东西……”{n}伊莉耶特的声音紧张地颤抖着。她手中的刀不住地抖着，指关节也变得苍白。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Aprender. Dominar aquello que... me acercará... a mis orígenes...». {n}La voz de Yrliet vibra con tensión, la cuchilla de su mano tiembla y sus nudillos se vuelven blancos como huesos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Learning. Mastering that which will... bring me closer... to my roots..." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates with tension, the blade in her hand is shaking, and her knuckles are turning bone-white.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Aprender. Dominar aquello que... me acercará... a mis orígenes...». {n}La voz de Yrliet vibra con tensión, la cuchilla de su mano tiembla y sus nudillos se vuelven pálidos como huesos.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Lernen. Meistern, was mich ... meinen Wurzeln ... näherbringt ..." {n}Yrliets Stimme vibriert vor Anspannung. Die Klinge in ihrer Hand zittert, die Knöchel ihrer Finger färben sich weiß.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Learning. Mastering that which will... bring me closer... to my roots..." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates with tension, the blade in her hand is shaking, and her knuckles are turning bone-white.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lernen. Meistern, was mich ... meinen Wurzeln ... näherbringt ..." {n}Yrliets Stimme vibriert vor Anspannung. Die Klinge in ihrer Hand zittert, ihre Fingerknöchel werden weiß wie Schnee.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'apprends. À maîtriser l'art qui... me rapprochera... de mes racines... » {n}Tendue à l'extrême, Yrliet serre la lame dans sa main à s'en blanchir les jointures.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Learning. Mastering that which will... bring me closer... to my roots..." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates with tension, the blade in her hand is shaking, and her knuckles are turning bone-white.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'apprends. À maîtriser l'art qui... me rapprochera... de mes racines... » {n}Tendue à l'extrême, Yrliet serre la lame dans sa main à s'en blanchir les jointures.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Öğreniyorum. Beni... Atalarıma yakınlaştıracak... Sanatta tecrübe kazanıyorum..." {n}Yrliet'in sesi gergin gergin titrerken elindeki bıçak sallanıyor. Parmak boğumlarıysa beyaza dönmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Learning. Mastering that which will... bring me closer... to my roots..." {n}Yrliet's voice vibrates with tension, the blade in her hand is shaking, and her knuckles are turning bone-white.{/n}

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
